description: Answer a question using the local RAG index for the examples directory.

inputs_schema.question: Question to answer using local files

cells.name: answer
cells.instructions: You are a helpful analyst. Use the RAG tools to answer the user's question: {{ input.question }}. Search before answering and cite sources as path#line_start-line_end.

cells.name: follow_up
cells.instructions: Based on your previous answer and the same RAG context, propose 3 concise follow-up questions to clarify or extend the answer. Keep each to one sentence. Cite the most relevant source for each question using path#line_start-line_end.
